CustomField.description: Indicates whether the approver receives only a notification for the approval request (when set to true) or gets the request assigned to them in addition to receiving a notification (when set to false, which is the default).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the approver receives only a notification for the approval request (when set to true) or gets the request assigned to them in addition to receiving a notification (when set to false, which is the default).
CustomField.label: Step Notify Only
